Sends the CommandText to the Connection and builds a dynamic object from DataReader.
Thrown when an exception error condition occurs.
The SQL transaction. The SQL statement, table name or stored procedure to execute at the data source. - (optional) the fields to skip. The dynamic object as parameters.
Result in a dynamic object.
